version_description:
We wanted to make it easier for you to quickly access your inbox and orders so we’ve added 3D Touch support to Fiverr’s home screen icon.

Stay tuned for more updates,
Fiverr’s Mobile Team

We’ve updated the Inbox with Real Time experience!
• Faster communication
• “Typing…” indicator
• Contact status and local time

You can now upload multiple attachments in a single message.

In this version, we’ve made it even easier to purchase Gigs on the app, with a new “Order Review” screen.
We’ve also added a straightforward new credit/debit card screen, which allows you to easily fill out the fields.

Stay tuned for more updates,
Fiverr’s Mobile Team

We’ve optimized the app to ensure it runs smoothly on the new iPhone X

We’ve also fixed a few bugs users were experiencing when logging in and placing an order.

We’ve optimized the app to ensure it runs smoothly on the new iPhone X

We’ve also fixed a few bugs users were experiencing when logging in and placing an order.

We wanted you to have a more personalized, focused experience, so we’ve divided the app into two modes: a Buyer mode and a Seller mode. This way, you’ll have quick access to everything YOU need.
Both a Seller and a Buyer? Don’t worry! You can easily switch between modes.
The improved Seller’s homepage includes standards needed to maintain your current seller level as well as next level requirements, so you can be sure to know what needs to be done to advance in levels.
Sellers, great customer satisfaction starts with you. We’ll evaluate your performance every month and determine your level accordingly.
Please note the first evaluation will take place January 15th, 2018.

**** Please Update ****
We’ve fixed a bug that displayed the wrong warning banner at the Seller’s homepage.
We’ve also improved the performance and fixed additional bugs.

We wanted you to have a more personalized, focused experience, so we’ve divided the app into two modes: a Buyer mode and a Seller mode. This way, you’ll have quick access to everything YOU need.
Both a Seller and a Buyer? Don’t worry! You can easily switch between modes.
The improved Seller’s homepage includes standards needed to maintain your current seller level as well as next level requirements, so you can be sure to know what needs to be done to advance in levels.
Sellers, great customer satisfaction starts with you. We’ll evaluate your performance every month and determine your level accordingly.
Please note the first evaluation will take place January 15th, 2018.

Ok, this update is packed with enhancements and bug fixes. Get ready to be impressed.
• You can now filter gigs in the search results based on a set price range.
• We improved the "Rate the App" popup, so it will be easier for you to rate. In case you forget: Fiverr = five star rating.

Sellers, here are some improvements just for you:
• We swapped between “Response Time” and “Positive Rating” in the Seller Dashboard, for better organization.
• We fixed areas that had no capital letter at the start of the sentence. Because. We care about. Every. Detail.
• Fixed next-level requirements: Selling Seniority was incorrect for some sellers
• Fixed a rare bug that didn’t load the homepage when users signed in
• Fixed both the colors and copy on notification banners
• Clicking on the seller image anywhere on the app will now always open the profile page

Buyers, here’s your new and improved Fiverr app:
• Fixed a bug that didn’t allow the Buyer Homepage to load in some cases
• Fixed the inability to leave a review on the app for some orders
• Fixed a bug in the inbox which saw the edit mode not functioning correctly, especially on iPhone X.

• We refreshed the Earnings screen to make it easier for Sellers to see detailed information about their revenue.
• Buyers can now submit their private feedback using the app.
• We’re testing an improved registration flow so some of you might enjoy a fresh look and feel.

Stay tuned for more updates,
Fiverr’s Mobile Team

• We refreshed the Earnings screen to make it easier for Sellers to see detailed information about their revenue.
• Buyers can now submit their private feedback using the app.
• We’re testing an improved registration flow so some of you might enjoy a fresh look and feel.

Stay tuned for more updates,
Fiverr’s Mobile Team

We wanted to make it easier for you to quickly access your inbox and orders so we’ve added 3D Touch support to Fiverr’s home screen icon.

Stay tuned for more updates,
Fiverr’s Mobile Team

• Faster communication
• “Typing…” indicator
• Contact status and local time

You can now upload multiple attachments in a single message.

We’ve got some great improvements to the chat and order status screens:
• Chat UI has been completely redone, we hope you like it!
• Custom offers are now easier to send/review
• You can now preview images and videos inline
• The order screen has been redone and is now easier to use

• You can now watch & download source-files to your mobile device.

• Chat performance upgrade.

• More currency are now supported. Change it to your local currency from the settings.

• Performance upgrade and bug fixes.

• From now on you can both open and upload most of the files using your phone.

Your invaluable feedback was used to build a giant-laser that eliminated more bugs.
Another step towards an even better experience. This time, we fixed and improved many things based on your feedback. Keep it going!
GIF file are supported everywhere - as a delivery, in the Gig gallery, as a conversation attachment, etc.

• iOS 13 support.
• As always, we fixed bugs and improved the app based on your feedback. Keep it coming.

• See more sellers details on their Gigs. Check the essential information on the Gig or navigate to their full profile.
• Multi-step authentication codes can be received through push-notifications. Make sure to enable it through your settings.
• As always, we fixed bugs and improved the app based on your feedback. Keep it coming.
Bug fixes and improvements.

• We’ve added the mutual orders between a buyer and a seller to the inbox conversion, for your convenience of referring to an active or past orders.
• The search engine is going to help you find exactly what you need with our new “did you mean” feature.
• GIF file are supported everywhere - as a delivery, as a conversation attachment, etc.
• As always we improved the experience based on your feedback. In this version: fixed marking notifications as read, inbox messages labeling, and much more.
• Bug fixes and improvements.

• Celebrating the new year with the future of work - getting more done together. Introducing just a few people of our community who have made us so proud as the face of our brand.
• We upgraded our reviews policy. To ensure fair reviews and feedbacks, we will reveal them only after both sides published their own.
Track your active orders in the homepage for quick glance and updates.
• Fixing a rare issue that may result in error when changing the payment method
• Get to know more about each other with a renewed seller and buyer profiles, available from any intersection of you and getting it done.

• Got any issue with the order? Create resolution requests directly through the app.
• Auto-detected and manually-marked spam conversations are now filtered from your inbox to a dedicated spam-box.
Track your active orders in the homepage for quick glance and updates.

We’ve rebuilt the entire notification system for the app. Here are the updates:
• Stay up-to-date wherever you are
• Control which notifications you’d like to receive on your mobile device
• Preview attachments and answer to messages within the notification

We’ve also packed some performance improvements for a much faster app start time.

Better personalized recommendations on the homepage.
Play Voice-Over sound samples directly from the Gig listings.

- We’ve boosted the app with improved performance for content. Starting in a few weeks, you will start seeing much more content in your app, that matches your interests. If you already have a picture in mind for how Fiverr can help you boost your business, don’t hesitate writing to us.

- As always, we smashed some bugs.

• Sellers can now add, edit and delete quick responses for the inbox and delivery messages.

• We are continually improving the order experience and deliver quality based on your feedback. This version we added a new order feedback form, to let you share your thoughts privately with our quality team.
• We also improved the filters to better direct you to exactly what you need. Especially, we made Voice Over exploration much easier with new visual filters.

Bug fixes and improvements.
GIF file are supported everywhere - as a delivery, in the Gig gallery, as a conversation attachment, etc.
Another step towards an even better experience. This time, we fixed and improved many things based on your feedback. Keep it going!

• See more sellers details on their Gigs. Check the essential information on the Gig or navigate to their full profile.
• Multi-step authentication codes can be received through push-notifications. Make sure to enable it through your settings.
• As always, we fixed bugs and improved the app based on your feedback. Keep it coming.

• We’ve rebuilt our navigation tabs. We added new tabs, ordered them, and made them much more visible and accessible. Got a message while comparing Gigs? Switching the context was never easier.
• You can now add someone’s else saved-Gigs list to your lists. So if you saw a shiny Gig-list, and you would like to go back to it later, just add it to your own lists.
• As always, we fixed bugs and improved the app based on your feedback. Keep it coming.

• iOS 13 support.

• We know how much the order-chat means to you, so we boost our performance to provide a super real-time experience.
• More under the hood bug fixes and improvements.

• We know how much the order-chat means to you, so we boost our performance to provide a super real-time experience.
• More under the hood bug fixes and improvements.

• Seeing the most updated information when navigating the app is quite an obvious thing to expect. We made sure all those sneaky little places will get updated when they need to. If, by any chance, you caught another one, please let us know, and our data updates task force will be on its way.
• Sellers - you just created the most detailed custom offer you ever made, and you are very proud of it? Why not saving it as a template so you can easily reuse it in the future, with or without modifications before resending it. Whatever works best for you and your clients.

• Check out the reviews on the Gigs and seller-profiles. We improved them to make your decision easier.
• You can now use your Fiverr Credits for orders made on the apps.

Your invaluable feedback was used to build a giant-laser that eliminated more bugs.
Some bugs were so 2019. We had to say goodbye and leave them behind us.
Some bugs were so 2019. We had to say goodbye and leave them behind us.

• We started our journey of localizing Fiverr experience to your language, by introducing German and Spanish. Found anything that is not 100% correct in your language? Step forward as our community member, and please let us know.
• Another big step for keeping your privacy - keep track on the devices that have access to your account through your settings.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• We improved the checkout flow because what is more important than simply understanding what you are paying for?!
• As always, some bugs met our shoe and were forced to find a new home.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

• A fresh new look to the notifications, so you’ll easily notice what requires your attention and what can wait for later.
• Fixed a bug that broke some of the links to the app.
• Fixed a bug that showed incorrect balance on the seller’s dashboard.

• Introducing Apple sign-in.
• As always, many bug fixes and improvements per your precious feedback.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

A major version is here!
• Our journey continues - we added French! Found anything that is not 100% correct in your language? Step forward as our community member, and please let us know.
• We paid attention to your requests and added a support for selecting and uploading multiple files at once.
• While our antivirus is protecting you for over 1.5 years, we added an indication for you when suspicious files were recognized, so you can better decide how to deal with it.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

A major version is here!
• Our journey continues - we added French! Found anything that is not 100% correct in your language? Step forward as our community member, and please let us know.
• We paid attention to your requests and added a support for selecting and uploading multiple files at once.
• While our antivirus is protecting you for over 1.5 years, we added an indication for you when suspicious files were recognized, so you can better decide how to deal with it.
• Improved performance in Inbox.

• Say hello to our renewed catalog that is designed to help you find the services you need to complete your goals in the shortest way possible.
• We added your personal balance breakdown to the account tab.

• Say hello to our renewed catalog that is designed to help you find the services you need to complete your goals in the shortest way possible.
• We added your personal balance breakdown to the account tab.
• Fixed a bug when uploading Attachments in iOS 12 with Japanese keyboard.
Using Fiverr in your own language? We added machine-translation so you can see almost anything in your language and better collaborate with your partners.

• Using Fiverr in your own language? We added machine-translation so you can see almost anything in your language and better collaborate with your partners.
* Performance and stability improvements.

• Using Fiverr in your own language? We added machine-translation so you can see almost anything in your language and better collaborate with your partners.
• Stability and performance improvements.
• Fixed issue where search suggestions might not work sometimes.

• Say hello to the fresh inbox. Swipe actions, more actions, and all the information you need, the way you need it. Collaboration on Fiverr was never so productive.
• We got some complaints that the first message sometimes misses the attachments and looks bad. Since we didn’t mean to kidnap your attachments, we made sure to always include it and gave it a fresh new look.
Sellers - we renewed “promote my Gigs” with more ways to get external traffic to your Gigs. Have more ideas? Share them with us.
Keeping you safe - we extended the anti-virus scanning to every attachment you receive.

• Keeping you safe - we extended the anti-virus scanning to every attachment you receive.
• Fixed a bug where some gigs didn't load and an error screen was shown.
Keeping you safe - we extended the anti-virus scanning to every attachment you receive.

• Fiverr Business - you can now pay using your Fiverr Business account on the app! We understand that you want to pay and approve your team orders on the go, and we will not slow you down. We can’t wait to see what your team achieves working together.
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

• Fiverr Business - you can now pay using your Fiverr Business account on the app! We understand that you want to pay and approve your team orders on the go, and we will not slow you down. We can’t wait to see what your team achieves working together.

• Fiverr Business - you can now pay using your Fiverr Business account on the app! We understand that you want to pay and approve your team orders on the go, and we will not slow you down. We can’t wait to see what your team achieves working together.
• Fixed a crash when using the calendar in order page.

• Fiverr Business - you can now pay using your Fiverr Business account on the app! We understand that you want to pay and approve your team orders on the go, and we will not slow you down. We can’t wait to see what your team achieves working together.
• Fixed a crash when using the calendar in order page.
• Added missing permission localizations in Italian.

• Think big! Looking to work on larger projects? Milestones allow the seller to divide your project into gradual steps with pre-defined goals, deadlines and deliverables and are now available on-the-go.
• New year’s bug fixes and small improvements are waiting for you in the app.

• Think big! Looking to work on larger projects? Milestones allow the seller to divide your project into gradual steps with pre-defined goals, deadlines and deliverables and are now available on-the-go.

• Fiverr Business - You can now add your credit card on-the-go straight from the app if you are an admin. No more friction on getting your projects done!
• Sellers- we heard you and we fixed the OOO settings so that Buyers will not contact you from the app when you are taking that precious time off.

• Fiverr Business - You can now add your credit card on-the-go straight from the app if you are an admin. No more friction on getting your projects done!
• Sellers- we heard you and we fixed the OOO settings so that Buyers will not contact you from the app when you are taking that precious time off.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
We fixed some annoying bugs because no one likes them.

• Sellers we heard your requests. You can now create Milestone custom offers from the app. Work through large projects in smaller steps. Set deadlines and get paid as you go. It’s a great way to build trust with buyers.
